item.createaddition.electrum_amulet.tool: When _life_ has got you down, clutching this _amulet_ in your pocket makes you feel like your _luck_ is about to change.
item.createaddition.spool.tooltip.behavi: Will remove the wire link and return a filled _spool_.
item.createaddition.copper_goblet.toolti: The extraordinary heat transfer ability of this _goblet_ will keep you cool when you need it the most.
Drinking from this _goblet_ will satisfy more than any regular bottle.
